$eref.description: This schema represents a numerical value with a unit of measure.

___value.description: The numeric value of the element.

references.description: The unit of measure of the element. Allowed values are drawn from the Common synonyms (non-UCUM) column of [subset of] UCUM, SI and English units.
The unit of measure of the element.
The SNOMED code represents Acceleration (physical force)
